text: Penelope is a 2006 American fantasy romantic comedy movie. It received mixed reviews by critics. It stars Christina Ricci, James McAvoy, Richard E. Grant, Peter Dinklage, Burn Gorman, Nigel Havers and Catherine O'Hara with Reese Witherspoon. ==Other websites== * Category:2006 comedy movies Category:2006 romance movies Category:2006 fantasy movies Category:2000s American fantasy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:2000s English- language movies Category:American independent movies
title: Penelope (movie)
